data.heading: Node Modelling
data.text: Lightweight Business Process Model and Notation
data.htmlContent:
This project offers tools to visualize complex data structures and dependencies as node-based graphs using React Flow. It aims to convert intricate code dependencies and data models into intuitive visual representations, simplifying understanding, memorization, and planning for future development. The system includes two main modules: the Dependency Flow Builder, which visualizes function dependencies and execution order from APIs, and the Model Builder, which generates node-edge models from structured data, such as Lindsey data. Both modules persist their output in localStorage and return data compatible with React Flow.

This visualization approach supports memorization by creating a mental map of relationships through spatial layout—such as placing main nodes centrally with dependencies above or below—and by clearly illustrating execution sequences (e.g., “calls #1”) to reduce cognitive load. It also enhances decision-making by exposing gaps or bottlenecks in the architecture, helping developers identify missing code, optimize execution order, and plan subsequent tasks. Designed with extensibility in mind, the localStorage-backed outputs enable incremental updates and seamless integration with a React Flow frontend.

data.heading: Coretify
data.htmlContent: Coretify is a centralized login account management system designed to simplify and secure user authentication processes across multiple applications. Built with Bun for high-performance server-side JavaScript execution and Express for routing and middleware management, Coretify ensures efficient handling of API requests. The project leverages JWT (JSON Web Tokens) to implement secure and stateless authentication, making it easy for users to log in and manage their accounts across various services. Coretify aims to be a robust, scalable, and secure solution for centralized user account management.

data.heading: Solopreneurs AI
data.htmlContent: SolopreneursAI is a tech-based company that offers cutting-edge AI tools designed to help solopreneurs, freelancers, founders, and small business owners win global clients. Our technology leverages social selling to expand our clients' reach, grow their client base, and thrive in today's competitive business landscape.SolopreneursAI's AI technology assists users by enhancing their personal branding and social selling efforts. This allows them to save time and simplify their operations, eliminating the need to spend hours on content creation, branding, or lead generation. Instead, users can focus on building relationships and taking care of their clients.I developed a comprehensive dashboard for SolopreneursAI to aid clients in generating content ideas, expanding their connections, and managing their ecommerce databases. This project was built using React for the front-end, Kontenbase for storage solutions, and Amazon EC2 for scalable server infrastructure.

data.heading: Darwin
data.htmlContent: Darwin is a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) backend service that build to improve question-answering capabilities by integrating external knowledge sources such as databases, cloud storage, and document files. The project involves creating a data pipeline where information from various sources is extracted, preprocessed, and converted into vector embeddings using state-of-the-art models. These embeddings are stored in a specialized vector database, enabling efficient similarity searches. When a user submits a question, the system retrieves relevant data from the database, combines it with a generative model, and produces contextually accurate and insightful answers. This approach enhances the system’s ability to respond dynamically, leveraging both static knowledge and real-time external data.

data.heading: Portfolio Admin
data.htmlContent: The admin project is a sophisticated content management system designed to manage and oversee my personal portfolio website. It handles dynamic interactions, ensuring efficient data processing, seamless communication with the frontend, and reliable CI/CD pipelines, which keep the portfolio's lab site up-to-date and responsive. Also manages the data for the main page of the portfolio, including Projects Showcase, Badges, Etc. The admin panel itself is designed to provide a centralized and user-friendly interface for content management. Through this combination of microservices architecture, serverless backend services, secure access management, and cost-effective hosting, the project showcases my technical expertise in backend development, serverless computing, DevOps practices, and securing modern web applications while ensuring scalability and maintainability.

data.heading: TBC Prediction
data.text: Tuberculosis Disease Prediction in Makassar City
data.htmlContent: This project is my research in my University. The goal is to offer insights into predicting TB spread in this region, which can be crucial for organizations addressing TB. The prediction is based on visualizations generated through the Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) algorithm. LSTM is a type of algorithm in artificial intelligence and machine learning designed to address both long-term and short-term memory challenges in sequential data or time series.The study utilizes time series data on TB cases in Makassar City from 2019 to 2023. This data is validated through the registration numbers of TB sufferers at the district and city levels. The data undergoes preprocessing before being used for training and testing the LSTM model. The model is then integrated into a website application developed for this research.The application is evaluated through various testing methods, including white-box testing, black-box testing, and feedback from relevant agencies that will utilize the application. The research aims to contribute to TB prevention and treatment in Makassar City by providing a predictive tool that aids in resource allocation, intervention planning, and more effective decision-making for public health authorities.
